body:
Since you didn't upload the last file you are using i took Chris's [123_CWM.gh](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/attachment/download?id=2985220%3AUploadedFile%3A1579545). It run fine on my system.

So i would ask if are you sure you have write rights in the c:\ladybug directory?

Have you succeeded with other cases?

If no, please give, in the workingFolder input, a location in your computer where you are sure the previous rights are granted.

Also, can you check at the bottom part of the panel with the report what is written in there? Your previous image doesn't show it and it looks suspiciously short compared with what i get (see image).

-A.
